item.title: Dying trees due to lack of water, 29th June
item.description:
These trees urgently need watering. It's a waste of money to plant established trees then not water then, whether or not there's a heatwave

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsmead Way, Hackney, London

item.title: Flytip, 29th June
item.description:
16 mattresses dumped in the road,bromley council and clarion housing need to step up and start listening that's 26 in 10 days,but they're not worried cos we'll be paying this can't be allowed to continue Apart from picking them up and charging those that haven't done this DO SOMETHING

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shottery Close, London

item.description:

item.title: Weekly fly tipping, 29th June
item.description:
The fly tipping continues. Happens every single week and I will continue to report every single week until this issue is resolved. Flat tenants above shops dumping their household rubbish on a weekly basis. Hazardous - foxes rip open bags and rubbish blown everywhere. Flies all over rubbish. Smells. Tenants dump rubbish at weekends (Friday to Sunday) knowing the bin men will just collect it on Monday. This shouldn't be allowed?? Should use bins like everything other person?? Disgusting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thursland Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 29th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ambrosden Avenue, Victoria, London
